scripts.sprite:st: gulp sprites --dir structures --prefix st && gulp imagemin
scripts.sprite:c: gulp sprites --dir contents --prefix c && gulp imagemin
scripts.build: gulp sprites --dir structures --prefix st && gulp sprites --dir contents --prefix c && gulp sass && gulp kss && gulp imagemin && gulp ejs && gulp copy && gulp watch
scripts.build:prod: gulp clean && gulp sprites --dir structures --prefix st && gulp sprites --dir contents --prefix c && gulp sass --env production && gulp kss && gulp imagemin && gulp ejs --env production && gulp copy
